description: Extension of three class blocks, addition of covered entrance courtyard and a new community building.  Associated alterations to existing school building. This is an amendment of the scheme granted planning consent P060792 on 7th June 2006 (modification).
decision_conditions:
The developer shall carry out a noise assessment following the guidelines of PPG24. A scheme for sound insulation and noise control measures should be submitted for the Council's written approval. The noise assessment should also include an outdoor target of 55dB LAeq,1hr. The scheme implemented and retained to the satisfaction of the Council in order to achieve the following noise target for neighbouring noise sensitive occupiers:
- Bedrooms (23.00-07.00 hrs) 35 dB LAeq , 45 dB LAmax(f);
- Living Rooms (07.00-23.00 hrs) 40 dB LAeq; and
- Kitchens, bathrooms, WC compartments and utility rooms (07.00 -23.00 hrs) 45 dB LAeq.

REASON: To protect the amenities of the occupiers of residential accommodation.
